description.lang: The PA-100 plug-in is a non-dimming switch which plugs into a standard AC outlet, and allows remote control of On, Off lights and AC operated appliances. Compact design allows second wall AC outlet to remain free.Serves as a node to repeat the signal in the network, extending the overall Z-Wave mesh wireless network rangeThe PA-100 uses the latest 500 series Z-Wave chip for longer range, over-air-firmware update, and easier inclusion process, providing these features are also supported by the gateway or controller.
Lifeline association only supports the u0022manual resetu0022 event. For instructions on how to set lifeline associate , please refer to your wireless controller instructions.
This parameter controls the state of the LED indicator in response to the state of the switch module.
The LED indicator will be OFF when the connected appliance is ON, and the LED indicator will be ON when the connected appliance is OFF.
The LED indicator will be ON when the connected appliance is ON and the LED indicator will be OFF when the connected appliance is OFF.
The LED indicator will always be OFF, regardless of connected appliance being ON or OFF.
